description.value:
Special: Accurate

Note: The Weapon is near slient and makes no flash when firing. Comes with an attachable Stock and long-barralled impellor to turn the weapon into a Two-Handed Basic Weapon if attached the weapon instead has a Range of 150m and weight of 4.5kg. Ammo is Rare and costs 15 Thrones each.
